title: Band, 1900–1950
medium:
Medium: wool, glass beads
Technique: double cloth
description: Long, narrow band patterned by small geometric animals, birds and plant forms in ivory, red, purple and yellow. Beads attached to both sides. One end has tapestry-woven tab fringe sewn together.

tombstone.epitaph:
Band, 1900–1950.Medium: wool, glass beads
Technique: double cloth. 1972-6-29.
